content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to Google the best language learning resources for learning Spanish and found websites like The Intrepid Guide, Business Insider, and All Language Resources. Then, I was instructed to browse the website https://www.fluentin3months.com/resources/spanish-learning-resources/ to find the best resources for learning Spanish, which provided a list of resources including SpanishPod101, Spanish Uncovered, Why Spanish is Easy, Conversation Countdown, Language Hacking Spanish, Fluent in 3 Months Bootcamp, Unlimited Spanish, Español en 3000, Forvo, LanguaTalk, Preply, Glossika, MOSALingua, and Wordreference. LingQ and Clozemaster Pro are suggested for intermediate and advanced learners. I wrote the list of resources to a file named "spanish_resource_list.txt" and executed a shell command to print "Hola, ¿cómo estás?" successfully.\n\nRecently, I received a command to browse the website https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/learning-english/free-resources/write-and-improve/ to find resources for practicing writing in Spanish. As per the command, I found the website and the resources available for practicing writing in Spanish. Additionally, your command to browse the website returned a list of English language learning resources from Google.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not mention any resources available for practicing writing in Spanish. It provides information on Cambridge's English Language Assessment products and services, including their free online tool called Write & Improve, which helps learners improve their English writing skills. The tool provides feedback on spelling, grammar, and vocabulary and has been used by over 2 million learners. The text also provides information on Cambridge's English language exams and tests, teaching qualifications, and consultancy services. \n \n Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/learning-english/free-resources/write-and-improve/#anchor-main)', '\\nCambridge (https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/)', '\\n        Products and Services\\n     (https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/)', '\\n        Products and Services\\n     (https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/)', '\\nAcademic Research\\n (https://www.cambridge.org/academic?__hstc=54931060.e5b7a3cfffe7bff6df65251c36a1e1a9.1684439559944.1684439559944.1684439559944.1&__hssc=54931060.1.1684439559944&__hsfp=1891108935)']"}]
"""
